lead_paragraph: A program called hip-hop therapy encourages students to give voice to their day-to-day struggles in neighborhoods where poverty and crime are constants.
snippet: A program called hip-hop therapy encourages students to give voice to their day-to-day struggles in neighborhoods where poverty and crime are constants.

headline.main: Bronx School Embraces a New Tool in Counseling: Hip-Hop
headline.print_headline: Students Are Giving Voice to Their Struggles

abstract: New Visions Charter High School for Advanced Math and Science II in Bronx is one of many schools across country that offers innovative program known as hip-hop therapy, which has as its goal reaching students who may not respond to more traditional counseling; program encourage students to express their emotions about grappling with crime and poverty.
